title: Analysis and Application of Mobile Learning Design Patterns: A Systematic Approach in Language Education Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing real-time collaboration and personalized learning experiences using personal devices. Focuses on integrating mobile tools in language learning contexts.

learning_goals: Systematically analyze mobile learning design patterns and present a framework applicable to language education.
Compare effective mobile learning strategies across K-12, higher education, and vocational training contexts based on literature analysis results.
Practice designing language learning activities optimized for a BYOD environment in Zoom-based real-time classes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
